messages.message:
Hello team,
We have added authentication to redis #15925 (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/15925) for an ongoing project with Goldman Sachs (& in general to follow best practices).
Although we have tested the change [as mentioned in PR description], please feel free to reach out to me if you see an authentication error [or slowness, in case your code is silently falling back to db].
update: pushing redis right now, there might be 1-2 mins downtime

if you are facing an error and are using pre-build images in provisioner, please rebuild redis using:
`cd third-party/docker/redis; make build-docker;`

Question: I am running my stack on localhost, What do i need to do to pickup this change?
Ans:
1. Build redis server [as shown in previous comment]
2. Rebuild services using redis [either using provisioner `python provisioner.py stop all; python provisioner.py compile all; python provisioner.py start all`;  OR if you run manually then, `make clean build runlocal` from the serviceâ€™s directory]
*Note: for now you have to run redis in docker mode [`make run-docker`] so that redis can pick up the configuration file.* I will try to make this optional in the future.
